posts.post_content:
The remaining 5 for $79, delivered.  If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price.  First taker gets it.  

Most forms of payment okay. If paypal, pay as friend; thanks.

I am always looking to upgrade [Good or better], so if you're interested in trading please send me a list of what you have. I prefer ungraded cards.

No pm's, please.  Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url], or post here. 

Stahl,--SOLD--
Dorner,--SOLD-- 
Fletcher,
Quinn [This one's the nicest of the bunch for me],--TRADED--
Arellanes,--SOLD--
Sweeney [very nice looking card, but, I was told it was a slight [1/8"?] tear, not a crease, on the left-hand border.  Without having been told, it would be hard to say],--SOLD--
Blackburne [damaged/creased 3/8" in right-hand border, otherwise nice card],
Leifield, striped sleeves--SOLD--
Hoffman, St.L,--SOLD--
Bliss [upon scrutiny, there appears to be a faint pencil erasure/imprint of "372" on back],
Bridwell portrait--SOLD--
Sullivan, Sovereign,--SOLD--
Maloney,
Anderson, 
Goode.--SOLD--

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in opposite order. Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
First come, first served, now reserving for tonight.

Hi Doug, I just need your paypal address to pay for Sullivan. I emailed you. Thanks again
Joe
